name: Romance in NYC - Shot ENTIRELY on the iPhone
blurb: I want to show how anyone with a camera phone these days can capture the most intimate moments beautifully!

name: SCRAPS - LGBTQ+ Feature Film
blurb: In rural 2003 Montana, two closeted teen boys navigate skateboarding, harsh small-town judgment, and a summer of unexpected young love.
